Reviews.Title: Spectacular TV
Reviews.Author: Micahret
Reviews.Content: We just recently got this TV.  And I first want to start off by saying WOW!  It is the clearest picture you will ever see.  The ease of set up and navigation around the Menu options is so simple.  Quick set up and assembly of base or wall mount.  When watching the baseball game in HD, you honestly feel like you are there watching in person.  Great price for a great tv.  I would highly suggest this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40C5000
Reviews.Author: D. Omex
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money....Fast delivery works great out of the box, easy set up (in my case stand alone use)The TV I got was a "open box" special and so far I haven't noticed anythig wrong with it. I buy lots of "stuff" from Amzanon.com and trust them for the quality of the products and the service they offer.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LedTV UN40c5000
Reviews.Author: Sherry Laflamme
Reviews.Content: Saw this TV in BestBuy last January 2010. Fell in love with it and almost bought it. The price was more than I could afford, but promised myself that I would get it as soon as the price was right and before Christmas 2010. Glad I waited as Amazon had it at an unbelievable price during the Thanksgiving "Black Friday" week. This is my first LED TV. Still have the old style TV, but that will probably go to a re-use store.I can't say enough about this beauty. I loved the screen/picture quality in the store and knowing they usually set the store models at their peak performance level, was ready for a slightly lesser quality. Guess what? No change. Straight out of the box it was great. Beware, though, that you need to run the channel setup before you see the best pictures ever. The channel setup picks up all of the digital channels and regular channels. I do not have a cable box. Just connected the cable to the TV. The "any-net" system recognized my Sony BD so getting on my netflix account is a cinch. Also there is no direct connect to the internet with this 5000 series. Unfortunately, Samsung's ads make you think that, so don't bother buying the Linkstick.

Reviews.Title: Good TV - Samsung was not ready to support
Reviews.Author: John Robert Hight "johnny634"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV as soon as the 2010 models were available.The Amazon purchasing experience was what we have come to expect:  easy, with delivery as expected.We had problems out of the box that were not related to the TV itself, but rather related to our cable provider, Brighthouse Networks.  In attempting to resolve the issue, I first called Samsung on about March 11, 2010.  The Samsung folks were unable to identify the model based upon the information I gave them from the label on the back of the TV.  Finally, I was told that Samsung representatives had not yet been provided with any information on the new 2010 models.  They were unable to help me at all. I was told that someone would call me back before the end of the month (Remember, this was March 11, so Samsung was are promising to call be back within three weeks!). I find it strange indeed that Samsung would begin delivery of products they are not prepared to support.That said, the problem was eventually diagnosed by Brighthouse and was related to their system not to the TV itself.  The TV has a fantastic, almost unbelievable picture.  Other than the fact that the speakers are marginal, I have not discovered anything I do not like about the TV.  I'll have to hook it up to play through my receiver, but given the thickness of the TV and the limited space for speakers within the unit itself, it's hard to believe the sound is as good as it is.This is a great product.  Hopefully in future years Samsung with have the sense not to sell new products before they are ready to support them.

Reviews.Title: Super thin tv
Reviews.Author: L. Moon
Reviews.Content: Times have changed! My tv was delivered by ups and i was able to carry a tv no problem onto the table. Um... wow! not too long ago there was no way you could. I have a big plasma tv in the bedroom and wanted to change my old old tv in living room. I decided i wanted a smaller tv there so it is not all about a tv. Something i can watch from the kitchen while i cook. Prices where higher then i thought for tv's now a days and i wanted to get a good picture. I learned about all the specs and this one had it all except not the fastest motion rating.120 hz which is fine. I could not tell the difference in the store from 120 to 240 at all!, so i saved money there. Samsung is known to make the best lcd tvs and they just look so beautiful too. Perfect. It was easy to set up but takes two people to assemble. One thing i find is it takes a while to start when you press power. The picture is great and better then my plasma most of the times but i have noticed when you watch scenes where it is shot in low lighting... like a night scene or if it is a really old movie.... the blacks are way too black and you loose all detail. I played around with the settings and nothing helps. I was surprised as all you read about is make sure there is a lot of blacks in the tv you buy.. i think it is over kill and mids need to be in there. I chose the 40 inch as it was the best deal for your money. I could have chosen the 46 but the price sky rocketed for that. Oh and there was a deal on at the time where if you bought the tv you would get a free blue ray dvd and wifi adapter. Awesome as now i can stream netflix and such. Another thing i found was that at first when i saw how small my 40 inch was (i thought it was going to be bigger) i kinda panicked and cursed to myself i should have gotten the 46 inch. But when you turn the tv on, somehow the picture looks a lot bigger! So it was actually perfect. Anyways i think the Samsungs are the best tv's out there and you will not go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Pavan
Reviews.Content: I got this product during Thanksgiving, and I got it at best offer.  Initially I am not inclined towards LED TV, but finally I got Samsung 40" LED UN40C5000, and it is simply perfectly awesome.  It has many features like, best picture/video quality, different number of modes, USB video/audio/picture playback etc.  But there are few things you need to remember before buying this TV.  VGA cable connector port is too thin at the rear end, so getting this VGA cable is little bit difficult.  Audio coming from TV is good, but when audio is playing from external source like USB then it seems like, audio output is very low.  But you can always connect TV to external home theater system.My 2 cents, if you want to buy a LED TV with less price, this is the one.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Steven Tabak
Reviews.Content: Love this TV. Very slim, great picture, very smart technology. Gorgeous design. Just bought a second one for my bedroom. Would not buy any other TV.

Reviews.Title: Good product so far. Check back for updates.
Reviews.Author: SandySTC "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: We received this TV on Feb. 8th, 2011. Paid $749. Free shipping, 30 day return on their dime if not satisfied. So far it has been a good set. The picture is very clear. The HD is amazing. We got the Samsung Blu-Ray w/internet apps and wireless adapter for free with this purchase. The internet apps (Netflix, Facebook, Pandora, etc) through the Blu Ray player work great with the TV. The 60hz refresh rate is not a problem as far as I can see. I was a little concerned about some parts near the edge of the screen not being as black as they should be but a few tweaks of the settings and all is fine. The software (firmware) that came in the TV was up to date, it did not need updated.I will update if any issues come up.

Reviews.Title: It was what i wanted.
Reviews.Author: Lewis Wilson II
Reviews.Content: The 5000 series LED backlit LCD Samsung was was I wanted.  In Walmart it captured my attention,  I just waited until I could find it at a lower price.  I think it has a pretty good black level and probably shadow detail.  It is very light weight and easy to move. It has a lot of connections and a headphone jack.  The volumn level in the headphone jack does not seem to be ajustable and is a little loud for me.Now the off angle picture quality does fall off radically.As the reviews state, there is quite a bit of blue cast in the blacks.The screen backlight inconsistancy doesn't show up when you are watching content, only in certain black screens modes.If the content has a blank, black screen then the screen is quite black and evenly lit.Over all I am still happy with the product, mainly perhaps, ultimately I only paid $500 for it.  It arrived with a broken base and the company refunded me $125 of the original purchase price, refurbished.I think if you are considering this set, the biggest caution would be if you need good off angle picture quality, then get something else.  But for me this is fine.

Reviews.Title: Great if positioned at the right place
Reviews.Author: G. Larocque
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN40C5000 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV (Black)We ordered this Samsung UN40C5000 as replacement for a UN40C6300 that had a short life of about an hour.After almost two months we do enjoy the later one with all it's features and picture quality,but like the other LCD tv it is better viewed from straight direct line and would best positioned hanging up on a wall because at any angle the picture fade to white and not as sharp.

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing!
Reviews.Author: V. Thyagarajan
Reviews.Content: This TV is simply amazing! The quality of high-def content looks stunning on this television, and the fact that it's and LED with a thin display is even better. I don't have an external A/V receiver hooked up yet, but the sound quality of the in-built speakers are very good for an LED TV. But my TV is also in a room that is not too big, so you might think differently depending on your room size. You will also want to fine tune the picture/color settings when you turn it on for the first time, but after you do it's perfect! And don't worry that this TV is only 60Hz instead of 120Hz...you won't even miss it.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV!!
Reviews.Author: C. Norwich "My Lighthouse"
Reviews.Content: WOW!!!! My first LED-LCD TV and love it. I had Sony TV for many years. I can't afford expensive Sony TV, this Samsung brand is great!At first it was confusing to hook up gaming, video phone, and DVD, due to yellow plug for video (didn't know where to plug in). Had to use the A/V box, someday I'm gonna get HDMI cable. Can't wait to try out the High Def service!!! Great Christmas and Birthday gifts to me! Very fast shipping!!!!

Reviews.Title: Flat screen TVs and speakers
Reviews.Author: Linda R. Lee
Reviews.Content: As long as I've got a decent picture on my TV I'm not too picky. Sound, though, is another matter. Flat screen TVs don't have much room for good speakers. Mine sounded all bad radio and tinny. Luckily, I had two Bose computer speakers not being used so we hooked those up to the TV. Better sound but not without its own problems. Can't be controlled by the TV remote for one thing. If you select TV speakers with external speakers connected you will get sound from both but increasing or decreasing volume with the remote doesn't affect the external speakers. Most of the time, I've got a happy balance but it is necessary to manually adjust the speakers because of uneven volume from various networks or shows.

Reviews.Title: Great television
Reviews.Author: robtk14
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing TV. My first LED-TV and the picture quality seems perfect. Great colors and blacks are, well, black. Haven't gotten around to test with top quality video games, but everything looks superb so far. The TV is also extremely thin and light.The only complaint I would have about it is that there is no S-video input. I'm not going to dock the TV for it's sound because you don't buy a TV for the sound quality, you buy a TV for the picture. It kills me when people will criticize it simply because the TV speakers don't sound like surround sound, get real.I have it hooked up to my PC (HDMI to DVI cable) with the audio going from my PC to external speakers I have for watching movies from my PC. I still can't figure out how to get sound from my PC to play on the TV speakers because the TV separates sound/video source DVI/3.5mm stereo input from the HDMI input (from what I can tell so far). That's why it may be smarter to go with just a straight up DVI cable if you want to play the sound from your PC to the TV speakers. One of these days I'll invest in surround speakers and receiver to make the set up easier to manage.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: ManbagGuhrarara
Reviews.Content: This Samsung is absolutely grand. It is sleek, the design is awesome, and picture quality s crystal clear.Design: The design is amazing on this TV. It is nice looking, and the red design on the outside panel is a nice touch, although you won't be paying much attention to it. It's nice to know that Samsung was focused on the overall package, not just the quality of the picture. Also, it is very slim and light weight, making it easy enough to set up.For TV/ Movies: Perfect. Picture is great, and the colors are stronger than LCD's, but not as rich and deep as one would expect with a plasma.For Gaming: This is where the TV kind of falls short. It's refresh rate only stands at 60hz, and compared with plasmas, it is weak. Especially when it comes to fast motion gameplay. If you're looking for a TV for gaming, I would recommend either finding an LED with a higher refresh rate, or skip straight to a plasma and save some money.Despite it not being that good for gaming, that is a mere step back. For the casual audience looking for a TV to watch cable and movies, this is easily a great buy. This TV deserves a 4 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: After looking at a number of TVs in a number of stores, I bought this based on the recommendation of Consumer Reports.  It was easy to set up, the picture quality is stellar, and the design is simple and elegant.  I would definitely recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: A Classy, Elegant, Sophisticated & Beautiful
Reviews.Author: soba525
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for my father.  It is a classy, elegant, sophisticated & beautiful television.Don't let the "red" scare you.  You hardly notice it.  It takes the "hard edge" off of the typical all black TV look.  Makes it look more elegant.And, the picture quality is great too!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Television - Warehouse Deal
Reviews.Author: Bryant "BZP"
Reviews.Content: I purchased my television through Amazon's Warehouse Deals division. I purchase a lot of my electronics through them because they discount things an insane amount for having chips, scrapes or markings on them. When I read that this TV was for sale for under $500 due to a back-side defect, I ordered it right away. After all, who looks at the BACK of a TV?Well, I received the TV and found that there was no defect at all... until I started assembling it. You see, the screen was absolutely perfect - still in the plastic, not a scratch or mark on it - and the bezel was in perfect condition. The problem was with the STAND: one of the tiny little plastic pieces on the stand had chipped off, which made the stand relatively unstable. Well, since the other "stability chip" (the plastic piece that inserts itself into the back of the TV, effectively created the bond between TV and stand) was still intact and the TV required screws to mount it anyway, I decided to take a bit of a risk (for now) and mount it.It worked. Now I'm viewing a gorgeous, 40" LED TV with pristine picture and okay speakers (seriously, don't complain - this TV is so thin, about 1.5" at most, you can't complain about not having awesome HD speakers). I'm still worried about the stand... by the way, I didn't even receive enough screws to fully mount the stand to the back of the TV either. I got 5 out of 10 screws. Ordering a new stand and the screws through Samsung costs around $40, but I'm going to try local stores for screws and I'm ordering the stand through a different vendor for cheaper.All in all, the television is exactly what I'd hoped it would be, and since I knew I was getting a small defect, I wasn't surprised when I found the stand was a little busted. Still, I couldn't be happier with the quality of the picture and excellent features of this television. This is a must-buy product.

Reviews.Title: Samsung, the best
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis
Reviews.Content: Great TV!!!Nice pictures and esay to understand menus.Super thin TV and USB works well.There are some apps you can download from samsungs web page but many are not suitable for this TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture, easy to navigate
Reviews.Author: P. Sites "birdnut"
Reviews.Content: Wow!  Crystal clear picture with vivid colors, deep blacks,and natural skin-tones.  Easy to set up and navigate the menus without looking at the manual.  We watch broadcast TV, sports, stream netflix with a Samsung CD6500 BluRay player.  LED picture is great, and 60 hz is not a problem.  It even looks great when it's turned off.  Great value -- LED quality without the high cost.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, HORRID Delivery
Reviews.Author: Christopher E. Lewis
Reviews.Content: After I try my TV some more, I'll write more about it. But, right now, I am impressed. It is the Samsung 2010 46" LED version of their award-winning 2009 LCD 46" TV and has some great features.Concerning the shipping, while it stated I would get 3-5 day shipping, it took about two weeks. Before the delivery, I had left written and verbal instructions and 3 phone numbers to call me 30 minutes prior to delivery. My TV sat in Buffalo for 6 days. Then someone called on day 7 and said no one was home when they had tried to make the delivery. Of course, they had not called me prior to delivery. Finally, after another 3 days, I received my TV and, yes, they called 30 minutes prior and, yes, I made it home to accept the delivery. VERY SHODDY delivery with one shipper blaming the previous. I am surprised because everything else from Amazon has had great shipping.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40" LED Smart TV bundles good combination
Reviews.Author: BLE373 "ble373"
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this TV.  We have an older Samsung 1080p plasma 42" which has a great picture, but we wanted to look at LED for the family room and felt it would pay to get a smart tv instead of adding a content box like apple tv or roku.WHat sold us was that this tv has DTS sound built in.DTS is the future.  It runs rings around dolby and srs, but very few audio products incorporate it into their product in order to reduce costs. In our case it was a deciding factor.  We were not disappointed.Picture and sound raise a bar for others to meet.  THe closest picture quality is on LG or Sony, but they lack DTS sound.  If you have never witnessed DTS sound on a tv, watch and listen to this demo on a two speaker stereo device:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oe7QzQyRpU4We hooked it up and were pleased at the ease and thoughtful set up.  Have easy remote internet access.  Good remote control and intuitive software.As we just completed setup, we are still exploring all functions, but are pleased with this purchase.  It plays audio and video off a usb drive easily.  Switches inputs easily.Cons:limited apps.  no apple itunes app support yet without work around.no direct iphone audio jack input.Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Awesome LED TV !!
Reviews.Author: TOOL744
Reviews.Content: what an awesome tv,It is sleek, the design is awesome, and picture quality Is crystal clear. Its great for blu rays and ps3. Great audio quality too. 4 hdmi outputs helps a lot too. My first Samsung tv and I love it!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time/money on 2nd tier brands!  Samsung the way to go, trust me!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Parkes
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Westinghouse LCD TV before this one (to upgrade from an older samsung) long story short, I returned it after many problems and I ended up buying the brand name samsung again.  At this point, I think Samsung is the best quality out there.  This TV is well worth the money, you get what you pay for!  Picture is fantastic.  like seriously.  LED is the way to go.  It's a clearer picture, the tv doesn't use as much energy, and it doesn't get hot.  I just got a feeling like the LED tv's are going to last a lot longer than LCD.

Reviews.Title: Samsung T.V.
Reviews.Author: denisdad
Reviews.Content: This item was quickly sent to me even during the holiday rush. It was well packaged and it was very easy to assemble. It was a very bulky package.I am very happy with the way everything went with this deal with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Media Player does not support CJK Characters
Reviews.Author: Kelvin
Reviews.Content: This product is great so far.  Excellent colors, super thin and great price.My only gripe for the less than satisfactory media player - when I try to play mp3 or media files that have any character other than a ASCII character, say Chinese character, the name of the songs/videos does not display properly but appear as squares.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV except for Media Player
Reviews.Author: D. Bobo "Techie"
Reviews.Content: I've had the TV for a few weeks now and love the picture.  Its crisp with the right amount of saturation and amazingly lit.  However, I am not satisfied with the media player feature.  It only sees a very limited type of video files (none from iTunes) and is not compatible with apple computers which I exclusively use.

Reviews.Title: Be careful - published dimensions are WRONG
Reviews.Author: H. Sawtelle
Reviews.Content: I measured my entertainment center (built into my home and not adjustable) very carefully multiple times, and selected this TV because it was supposed to fit with room to spare based on the published dimensions (24.4 inches high WITH STAND). I received it and put it together and guess what?  25.75 inches high! Why go to the trouble of reporting a dimension to a tenth of an inch if you are going to be wrong by 1.35 inches?? Thanks Samsung! I called them and they said there is nothing I can do to adjust the stand, etc.I suppose I can box it up, send it back, and find something else, but I already sold my old TV and now this is a big waste of my time. I guess I'll be driving out to Best Buy to measure everything before I buy something else too, which sort of defeats the purpose of online shopping. Bitter . . .Needless to say I haven't hooked up any sources or turned it on - the performance is kind of irrelevant to me since it doesn't fit in my house. The panel is razor thin and the design is pretty sleek. It's also light and easy to carry around, which is nice since I'll be doing a lot more of that.
